text: @RealJamesWoods Has covid19 been introduced to the public by the democrats to stop the successful Trump rallies? Which it will certainly do. I would not eliminate this possibility past the democrats. Remember their statement "A tremendous Opportunity to Restructure Things to Fit Our Vision".
